translation.en: [man 1] No sleep around here.
translation.de: Da draußen ist jemand. Da drüben.

translation.en: Feckin' sheep!
Seventeen, 18, 19, 20…
Feckin' sheep.
What's wrong with ya?
Where's your mate?
Out there?
Oh shit!
-♪ We live for the revelry… ♪ -[phone chimes]
Wow. You are so lost.
translation.de: Wenn du dich mal nicht verirrt hast.

translation.en: I'm impressed with your confidence in the face of complete ignorance.
translation.de: Dein Selbstvertrauen angesichts der Lage beeindruckt mich.

translation.en: Issue is, you're overcommitted. I mean, you're essentially running.
translation.de: Aber du bist zu engagiert. Du rennst ja quasi.

translation.en: And now that I'm here, you can't give me the satisfaction of turning around--
translation.de: Und jetzt, da ich da bin, kannst du nicht umdrehen.

translation.en: I don't need help, but thanks.
[chuckles] I don't remember offering it.
So presumptuous. You must be a fairy.
translation.de: Wie anmaßend. Du musst eine Fee sein.

translation.en: I am a fairy.
Sorry, that's just something I never thought I would say.
translation.de: Dass ich das mal sagen würde.

translation.en: [chuckles] It's an odd thing, considering you're standing in a courtyard of a college for fairies.
translation.de: Seltsam, wo das doch eine Schule für Feen ist.

translation.en: We don't have a lot of those where I'm from.
translation.de: Wo ich herkomme, gibt es die nicht.

translation.en: And what realm are you from?
California.
-Oh, you're not from the Otherworld? -I'm not.
If you want your mind blown, three months ago,
translation.de: Vor drei Monaten wusste ich nicht mal,

translation.en: I didn't even know the Otherworld existed. [chuckles]
If you are lost, which I'm not saying you are,
and you need help, which I'm not saying I'm offering…
This is the Specialist Hall.
The Fairy Hall is that way.
Oh, the Specialist Hall. Obviously.
[girl 1] And I definitely know what a Specialist is!
translation.de: Ich weiß, was ein Spezialist ist.

translation.en: -Right. Sorry, I'd be happy to-- -Mansplain it?
translation.de: Tut mir leid, ich kann… Mich belehren?

translation.en: -No. -[girl 1] Sure.
Kinda seems like your thing.
[boy 2] Quit perving on the first years.
-Riv, just give me one second. Yeah? -Why? You gonna chase her?
Nope.
[Riv] How are you, man?
-[girl 2] Bloom. -Yeah. You must be Stella.
I was… waiting. I just… I got impatient. [chuckles]
translation.de: Ich habe gewartet. Ich wurde nur ungeduldig.

translation.en: How very American of you. Shall we?
Miss Dowling tells me this is your first time in the Otherworld. I hope your trip was painless.
translation.de: Du bist zum ersten Mal in der Anderswelt? Weich gelandet?

translation.en: Miss Dowling gave me a time and location where there'd be a gateway.
translation.de: Miss Dowling gab mir Zeit und Ort für ein Tor.

translation.en: It was in the middle of nowhere, so it wasn't convenient.
translation.de: Mitten im Nirgendwo, nicht gerade praktisch.

translation.en: The headmistress likes to do things by the book, and keeping your world a secret from ours is chapter one,
translation.de: Die Schulleiterin befolgt die Regeln und hält beide Welten voreinander geheim,

translation.en: no matter how inconvenient it may be.
translation.de: egal wie unpraktisch es sein mag.

translation.en: But if you ever want to go back…
That's a whole lot of ring.
Family heirloom. Gateway ring.
The only thing that keeps you sane in this place is the ability to leave it.
Your world may not always be thrilling, but it beats this one.
translation.de: Deine Welt ist bei Weitem besser als diese.

translation.en: There are seven realms in the Otherworld, each a different kind of boring.
translation.de: Sieben Reiche in der Anderswelt und alle sind langweilig.

translation.en: [woman] Think of Alfea as your new home.
I'm sure it must be overwhelming, an entirely new world.
translation.de: Es ist sicher überwältigend, eine neue Welt.

translation.en: And yet I saw no less than three people updating their Insta stories.
translation.de: Und doch sah ich drei Leute, Insta-Stories aufnehmen.

translation.en: I was half-expecting a school full of Tinkerbells zipping around.
translation.de: Ich erwartete, hier Glöckchen umherfliegen zu sehen.

translation.en: Disappointed?
Just kinda bummed I didn't see a single pair of wings.
translation.de: Ich dachte nur, ich sehe Flügel.

translation.en: Hm. Well, we had wings in the past.
As we've evolved, transformation magic has been lost.
Also, Tink was an air fairy. You're a fire fairy.
translation.de: Und Glöckchen war eine Luft-Fee. Du bist eine Feuer-Fee.

translation.en: Yeah, that much I know.
-So, when do we… we start? -[woman] Classes begin tomorrow.
translation.de: Wann geht's los? Die Kurse starten morgen. Du lernst die Grundlagen.

translation.en: You'll start with the basics. Learn to use your magic slowly but safely.
translation.de: Die Kurse starten morgen. Du lernst die Grundlagen. Langsam, aber sicher.

translation.en: When you say… slowly…
I mean it.
Magic can be dangerous, as you well know.
translation.de: Magie kann gefährlich sein, wie du weißt.

translation.en: Our curriculum is designed with that in mind.
Trust the process.
The slow process.
Alfea's graduates have ruled realms and led armies.
translation.de: Alfeas Absolventen regierten Reiche und führten Armeen.

translation.en: They've forged powerful relics… and rediscovered long-lost magic.
translation.de: Sie schmiedeten mächtige Werkzeuge und entdeckten alte Magie wieder.

translation.en: They shape the Otherworld.
If you succeed here,
you will too.
Well, this place, the Otherworld, uh… Alfea,
translation.de: Nun, dieser Ort, die Anderswelt, Alfea…

translation.en: it seems amazing. It… This isn't my home.
translation.de: Er ist unglaublich. Aber er ist nicht mein Zuhause.

translation.en: I don't need to rule a realm or lead an army and…
translation.de: Ich brauche kein Reich, keine Armee…

translation.en: I'm here because you promised you'd teach me control.
translation.de: Ich bin hier, um es zu kontrollieren.

translation.en: No, Bloom.
You're here because you knew you had no other choice.
[woman] How was your flight?
[Bloom] Good. You know, long.
-[man] Well, the room looks nice. -It is.
-It's big. -[woman] Roommates?
Friends?
It's literally hour one of day one, Mom.
translation.de: Ich bin erst eine Stunde hier.

translation.en: [mom] Don't glare.
You can learn a lot about people on their first day.
translation.de: Man kann auch da schon viel über Leute lernen.

translation.en: [Bloom] Everyone seems… cool, I guess.
I mean, it's five girls in an enclosed space,
translation.de: Wir sind fünf Mädels auf engem Raum.

translation.en: so it's a matter of time before we descend into a Lord of the Flies situation and…
translation.de: Nur eine Frage der Zeit, bis wir einander à la Herr der Fliegen

translation.en: kill each other.
Lady of the Flies, sweetie. Don't be sexist.
Could you at least make an effort to be social, Bloom?
I know how you are. This is a fresh start.
translation.de: Ich kenne dich. Das ist ein Neuanfang.

translation.en: -Don't just sit in your room-- -Got it, Mom. Thank you.
Hey, I see a window. Do you have a nice view?
translation.de: Ich sehe ein Fenster. Ist die Aussicht gut?

translation.en: [snickers] No, the first years have crap views.
translation.de: Die Neulinge haben keine gute Sicht.

translation.en: Well, I bet the worst view of the Alps is better than the best view of Gardenia.
translation.de: Der schlechteste Blick auf die Alpen ist besser als der beste auf Gardenia.

translation.en: [dad] What time is it there, by the way? It seems bright.
translation.de: Wie spät ist es? Es ist hell.

translation.en: Yeah, actually, um, it…
-[girl] All right. -It's… It's…
-Lights out. Phones off. -[Bloom] Uh, gotta go, guys.
-I love you. -[dad] Love you too, sweetie.
You're a lifesaver.
I'll answer to that. Or to Aisha.
translation.de: Nenn mich gern so. Oder Aisha.

translation.en: Just wanted to get in your good graces so you don't go Lady of the Flies on me.
translation.de: Ich wollte mich mit der Herrin der Fliegen gut stellen.

translation.en: [Aisha] Do I wanna know why they think you're in the Alps?
translation.de: Du bist also in den Alpen?

translation.en: My… parents are both human.
So they think that Alfea is an international boarding school in Switzerland.
translation.de: Sie halten Alfea für ein Internat in der Schweiz.

translation.en: Human parents, fairy daughter?
Miss Dowling said there's, um, a fairy somewhere in my family tree,
translation.de: Laut Miss Dowling gab es eine Fee in meinem Stammbaum,

translation.en: like a long-dormant magical bloodline.
One of these days, I'm gonna get used to how absolutely ridiculous this all sounds.
translation.de: Irgendwann gewöhne ich mich daran, wie albern das klingt.

translation.en: [Aisha] Oh my God.
Are you the one person in the universe who's never read Harry Potter?
translation.de: Hast du denn nie Harry Potter gelesen?

translation.en: Please. If you knew how many hours I have wasted taking Sorting Hat quizzes…
translation.de: Wenn du wüsstest, wie viel Sprechender-Hut-Tests ich gemacht habe…

translation.en: Sometimes Slytherin, yeah.
That explains the lies then.
Hm. Let me guess. Gryffindor.
Explains the judgment.
May I help you?
Are you changing? [Stella] I am.
I thought the orientation party was a casual thing.
translation.de: Ich dachte, die Feier sei keine große Sache.

translation.en: It is. [Bloom] So, a casual thing you're changing for?
People have seen me in this outfit already. They'll expect something different.
translation.de: Die Leute kennen das Outfit schon. Das wird auffallen.

translation.en: People expect you to wear multiple outfits a day?
translation.de: Die Leute erwarten, dass du dich umziehst?

translation.en: People expect me to care how I look.
translation.de: Dass mir mein Äußeres wichtig ist.

translation.en: Something else?
That light, that's… magic.
How exactly do you--
I'm a mentor, not a tutor.
Look, this is something you'll learn on your first day in class,
translation.de: Das lernst du morgen im Unterricht,

translation.en: but fairy magic is linked to emotion.
translation.de: aber Feenmagie ist an Emotionen gebunden.

translation.en: It could be good thoughts, could be bad.
Love. Hatred. Fear.
The stronger the emotion, the stronger the magic.
translation.de: Je stärker die Emotion, desto stärker die Magie.

translation.en: So, do you… [chuckles] …do you hate me or do you fear me?
translation.de: Also hasst oder fürchtest du mich?

translation.en: You were just looking at me when you did the… spell.
translation.de: Du hast mich beim Zaubern angesehen.

translation.en: I'm pretty sure you don't love me, so…
Well, I don't know you. [laughs]
But I'm sure once I do, I'll find… something to love.
translation.de: Aber ich finde sicher etwas Liebenswertes an dir.

translation.en: [Bloom] Yeah.
Shared space, Terra.
Everyone loved The Secret Garden because it was a secret.
translation.de: Der Geheime Garten war beliebt, weil er geheim war.

translation.en: Actually, that's not quite the message of The Secret Garden.
translation.de: Bei Der Geheime Garten ging es darum,

translation.en: It's a story about how when things are kept private their benefits aren't fully appreciated.
translation.de: dass sich Dinge unter Verschluss nicht voll entfalten können.

translation.en: [chuckles softly] OK.
[clicks tongue] Well, she seems lovely.
She's just having fun.
I know it's a lot. Shocker. Earth fairy called Terra likes plants.
translation.de: Schock! Die Erd-Fee namens Terra mag Pflanzen.

translation.en: It's a family thing. I've got this cousin called Flora,
my mum's Rose, and my dad works in the greenhouse here.
translation.de: meine Mutter Rose, mein Vater ist hier Gärtner.

translation.en: That's why I know a load of second years. I grew up around Alfea, so…
translation.de: Ich kenne viele im zweiten Jahr. Ich wuchs hier auf…

translation.en: Stella's a second year? Why is she in a suite with first years?
translation.de: Stella ist im zweiten? Was macht sie hier?

translation.en: Oh yeah! Um…
Uh, I dunno, uh, really.
Uh, an administrative thing…
Also, sorry, I just wouldn't bring it up with her.
translation.de: Ich würde sie nicht darauf ansprechen.

translation.en: You know? Um, let's all of us just blanket statement, "Who cares?"
translation.de: Weißt du? Sagen wir einfach: "Wen interessiert's?"

translation.en: Do you want a succulent?
They're really hip, low maintenance, very you.
translation.de: Sie sind cool, stressfrei, wie du.

translation.en: -Sorry. Not that I know you. -If I take it, will you stop talking?
translation.de: -Ohne dich zu kennen. -Bist du dann ruhig?

translation.en: -Terra, I'm just having fun. -[Terra] OK.
Thank you.
-Actually, this one might be… -[sighs]
[Terra] Musa?
-Did you say you grew up at Alfea? -I did. Weird childhood, let me tell you. But--
translation.de: -Du bist hier aufgewachsen? -Ja. Schräge Kindheit, aber…

translation.en: I went for a swim in the river, but I don't suppose this place has a pool?
translation.de: Ich war im Fluss schwimmen. Einen Pool gibt es wohl nicht?

translation.en: -Wait. Did you say you've been swimming? -Mm. I go twice a day every day.
-But you just got here. -You do know what "every day" means?
translation.de: Du kamst erst an. Ich sagte "täglich".

translation.en: Well, the only thing close is the pond where the Specialists train,
translation.de: Es gibt nur den Teich bei den Spezialisten.

translation.en: but nobody swims there, at least not on purpose.
-[boy] There's something about her. -What, you're smitten after one chat?
translation.de: Sie hat etwas. Bist du schon verliebt?

translation.en: What is it with you and the crazy ones?
translation.de: Wieso willst du immer die Irren?

translation.en: How do you know she's crazy? You haven't even met her.
translation.de: Wieso ist sie irre? Du kennst sie nicht.

translation.en: She's a ginge. They're all nuts.
Amazing shags though.
Oh, you speak from experience? Didn't realize your hand was a redhead.
translation.de: Wusste nicht, dass deine Hand rote Haare hat.

translation.en: You got slow this summer. [exhales] Correction.
I got high this summer.
Really?
Whatever big-brother speech you're about to give me…
-There's no speech. -…I don't wanna hear it.
A more productive use of your time would be to distract your aggro father figure
translation.de: Versuch lieber, deine Aggro-Vaterfigur davon abzuhalten,

translation.en: so I don't got expelled.
So, after your classes,
you are all mine.
And I like the things I own to work well, so you will train every day.
translation.de: Und ich achte auf meinen Besitz, also trainiert ihr jeden Tag.

translation.en: Find your skill.
Hone your skill. And eventually even you…
translation.de: Verfeinert sie. Irgendwann kämpfst sogar du…

translation.en: can fight like him.
He fights even better with a bit of advance warning.
translation.de: Mit Vorwarnung ist er noch besser.

translation.en: He did all right. Favored his left, but what else is new?
translation.de: Er war ok. Zog die Linke vor wie immer.

translation.en: Sky's father was Andreas of Eraklyon.
translation.de: Skys Vater war Andreas von Eraklyon.

translation.en: That made him a legacy admission,
but he still showed up on the first day and did the work.
translation.de: Dennoch legte er sich stets ins Zeug.

translation.en: Well done.
I expect nothing less from the rest of you,
whether you're third generation and your parents demanded you come
translation.de: Ob eure Eltern wollten, dass ihr hierherkommt,

translation.en: or if I personally selected you from your realms for service.
translation.de: oder ich euch persönlich rekrutiert habe.

translation.en: That decision was made
based on your natural talents in combat and weaponry,
translation.de: beruhte auf euren Fertigkeiten im Kampf und dem Umgang mit Waffen.

translation.en: and I expect to see that skill in evidence daily.
translation.de: Diese Fertigkeiten möchte ich täglich sehen.

translation.en: This place will seem like hell…
translation.de: Ihr werdet euch in der Hölle wähnen…

translation.en: until actual hell comes.
We are the first line of defense.
-A certainty when the future is uncertain. -[snickers]
Is that funny?
It's just you're talking about preparing for the future
translation.de: Es ist nur, wir sind ein Haufen Kinder

translation.en: in a castle with kids using swords. [chuckles]
Must be nice to live in a world where you can be so soft,
translation.de: Muss toll sein, es so lässig nehmen zu können.

translation.en: where you fear so little, disrespect seems an option.
translation.de: So wenig zu fürchten, dass man aufbegehrt.

translation.en: Do you know why the Barrier exists?
To protect the school from Burned Ones.
translation.de: Um uns vor Verbrannten zu schützen.

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Have you ever seen a Burned One?
[boy] Nobody my age has.
But that's kinda my point.
translation.de: Das ist mein Punkt. Ist das nicht vorbei?

translation.en: -Isn't that all over now? -What if it's not?
translation.de: Das ist mein Punkt. Ist das nicht vorbei? Und wenn nicht?

translation.en: Do you think you would know what to do?
translation.de: Wüsstest du, was zu tun ist?

translation.en: I was ten when I saw one for the first time.
translation.de: Ich war zehn, als ich meinen ersten sah.

translation.en: I was gathering firewood with my father, and we heard it.
translation.de: Vater und ich sammelten Holz. Da hörten wir es.

translation.en: -It was like a rasp. -[loud rasping]
[teacher] A clicking.
My father shot it twice. Once in its chest, once in its head.
translation.de: Mein Vater schoss zweimal. Einmal in die Brust, einmal im Kopf.

translation.en: It didn't matter.
Burned Ones have inhuman speed and strength,
translation.de: Verbrannte sind unmenschlich schnell und stark.

translation.en: and if they cut you,
the infection that follows is swift and severe.
I watched it happen.
I watched the light dim from my father's eyes,
and when he dropped his shotgun, I knew what I had to do.
translation.de: Als er die Flinte fallen ließ, wusste ich, was zu tun war.

translation.en: [teacher] Be thankful you've never seen a Burned One.
translation.de: Sei froh, dass du noch keinen gesehen hast.

translation.en: But if you ever do,
pray that it kills you so the ones you love will not have to.
translation.de: bete, dass er dich umbringt, damit es kein anderer tun muss.

translation.en: [teacher] It's fresh.
[female teacher] Maybe a wolf?
Or a bear.
Could have gone out to protect his herd, got surprised.
translation.de: Wollte seine Herde schützen, wurde überrascht.

translation.en: I'm happy to continue the guessing game, but…
This is char residue.
How long since the last sighting?
-[man] About two decades. -Sixteen years. Rosalind was relentless.
translation.de: Etwa 20 Jahre. Sechzehn. Rosalind war unerbittlich.

translation.en: -Could've been hiding-- -She killed all the Burned Ones.
translation.de: -Er hätte sich ver… -Sie hat alle getötet.

translation.en: We thought she did.
Ben, what we think is irrelevant. The Barrier's doing its job.
translation.de: Ben, das ist irrelevant. Die Barriere hält.

translation.en: Until we know something for sure, let's clean this up before gossip starts.
translation.de: Räumen wir ihn weg, bevor es die Runde macht.

translation.en: [Terra] Who actually saw the shepherd's body?
Maybe he was just old. People get old, die. We all die.
translation.de: Vielleicht war er alt. Alte Menschen sterben.

translation.en: That old-age decapitation really sneaks up on you.
translation.de: Und bevor man sich versieht, wird man enthauptet.

translation.en: Happened to my nan right in the middle of bingo.
translation.de: Wie meine Oma beim Bingo. Rollte…

translation.en: -Down the table. -[Musa chuckles]
-No judgment, but… -I eat a million calories a day.
translation.de: -Und du… -Ich esse eine Million Kalorien pro Tag.

translation.en: If I didn't swim, I'd be massive.
-[Musa] I used to dance. I get it. -On that note…
Second round. Damn! Twice a day every day. You weren't kidding.
translation.de: Zweite Runde. Zweimal täglich. Das war kein Witz.

translation.en: So you did hear her earlier?
What?
In the room. Um…
You had your headphones on and ignored me as though you couldn't hear me,
translation.de: Mit den Kopfhörern. Ich dachte, du hörst mich nicht,

translation.en: but you did hear Aisha.
Sometimes I just wear my headphones when I don't feel like talking.
Yeah. It just seems like that happens a lot…
around me.
It's a me thing. It's not you.
You've said enough. I've said too much.
Dad? Where you going? Greenhouse?
-Anything you need help with? -That is not going to happen, love.
It's your first day. No hiding in the greenhouse.
translation.de: Kein Verstecken an deinem ersten Tag.

translation.en: You wanted to go to Alfea your entire life.
Mingle.
translation.de: Misch dich unters Volk. Sei ganz du selbst.

translation.en: -Be you. -OK.
translation.de: Misch dich unters Volk. Sei ganz du selbst. Ok.

translation.en: Uh, the headmistress is busy. You'll have to book an appointment.
translation.de: Die Schulleiterin ist beschäftigt. Mach einen Termin.

translation.en: -Excuse me? -I'll just take a water. Room temp.
-Thanks, love. -[scoffs]
If the door is closed, it means she doesn't want--
translation.de: Wenn die Tür zu ist, will sie nicht…

translation.en: Headmistress Dowling!
I'm Beatrix, and I'm probably going to sound like an arsehole right now,
translation.de: Ich bin Beatrix. Vermutlich klinge ich wie ein Arsch,

translation.en: but I'm literally your biggest fan.
translation.de: aber ich bin Ihr größter Fan.

translation.en: Probably shouldn't have said "arsehole" in front of the headmistress!
translation.de: Den "Arsch" hätte ich mir wohl sparen sollen.

translation.en: Bollocks. Shit!
-On a winning streak, I see. -Sorry. For all of it.
translation.de: -Du bist in Fahrt. -Tut mir leid. Alles.

translation.en: It's just I've waited my whole life for this, to be here.
I'm obsessed with this place, its history,
translation.de: Ich liebe diesen Ort, seine Geschichte,

translation.en: your history.
Noted.
Perhaps you'd like to study that history in the library? I have work to do.
translation.de: Lesen Sie doch darüber in der Bibliothek. Ich habe zu tun.

translation.en: -[Bloom] You can't make me go out! -It's Saturday. Get out of your room.
translation.de: -Ihr könnt mich nicht zwingen! -Es ist Samstag.

translation.en: Get out of the house.
I literally went out earlier today.
Go to the movies. Go to a party.
Go somewhere that's not a rummage sale or an antique store.
translation.de: Nicht auf Flohmärkte und in Antiquitätenläden.

translation.en: Oh, I see. So it's not enough I go out. I have to be a basic bitch like my mom was.
translation.de: Rausgehen reicht also nicht. Ich soll gewöhnlich sein.

translation.en: Better that than some weird loner.
Wow, you just called your daughter a weird loner.
Take a parenting class!
I'm worried about you, Bloom.
translation.de: Ich mache mir Sorgen um dich.

translation.en: Maybe worry about why you have so little going on in your sad life
translation.de: Frag dich lieber, warum dein Leben so langweilig ist,

translation.en: that you're obsessed with the tedious minutiae of mine.
translation.de: dass du besessen von meinem bist.

translation.en: -[Bloom] This is a lot of people. -[chuckles]
[Sky] What?
You don't have parties in… California?
translation.de: Gab es keine Partys in Kalifornien?

translation.en: Oh, he remembers!
Oh, impressed?
Where can I go that's the opposite…
translation.de: Wo finde ich das Gegenteil von hier?

translation.en: of this? What's outside?
-What, beyond the Barrier? -Mm-hmm.
Well, depending on rumors,
wolves, bears, or something much scarier.
But no people?
-Um-- -Perfect, thanks. At the risk of, um… mansplaining,
translation.de: -Perfekt, danke. -Auf die Gefahr hin, zu belehren.

translation.en: it is dangerous outside right now. You probably shouldn't go alone.
translation.de: Es ist gefährlich da draußen. Geh besser nicht allein.

translation.en: Are you offering to escort me?
[chuckles] Is that what this is? It's not the worst pickup line.
-It wasn't a line. -Mm. -Trust me? -Hm.
translation.de: Das ist es nicht. Traust du mir?

translation.en: I just met you, but maybe one day I will.
translation.de: Ich kenne dich kaum. Irgendwann vielleicht.

translation.en: Hey, Sky. Can we talk?
I haven't seen you all day. Summer, Stella. All summer.
translation.de: -Hab dich heute noch nicht gesehen. -Den ganzen Sommer nicht.

translation.en: You know that girl you were talking to, Bloom?
She's my suite-mate.
What does that mean, Stel? -That I can't talk to her? -I didn't say that.
translation.de: -Und? Darf ich nicht mit ihr reden? -Das sagte ich nicht.

translation.en: What are you saying, specifically?
I'd hate to make you upset. I know what happens when you get upset.
translation.de: Ich will dir nicht wehtun. Ich weiß, was dann passiert.

translation.en: [Stella] I'm sure you'll do the right thing. I always do.
Enjoy the show?
Right. Good thoughts.
Pictures of my sad teenage years, not happy thoughts.
translation.de: Bilder meiner traurigen Jugend. Nicht gut.

translation.en: Noted.
[whimpering] No!
-[Bloom] What are you doing here? -[Aisha] It's OK, Bloom.
-It's OK. -Aisha, you should not be here.
Neither should you. You're losing control.
Yes, I know that.
Calm down. If you get angry at me--
[Bloom] Just go… away!
Aisha, run!
[Bloom] No, you shouldn't have been out there.
Is that American for "sorry I almost set you on fire"?
translation.de: Entschuldigt man sich in Amerika so?

translation.en: You were a runaway train with no idea what you were doing.
Which is why I was out there alone trying to figure it out.
translation.de: Weshalb ich es allein probieren wollte.

translation.en: Brilliant idea.
I'm not like the rest of you.
I didn't grow up here. I don't have fairy parents.
translation.de: Ich bin nicht von hier. Ich habe keine Feeneltern.

translation.en: I've done magic once in my life and it was…
translation.de: Ich habe einmal Magie angewandt und es war…

translation.en: What? Terrible? I'm shocked.
I flooded my entire secondary school after I failed a math test.
translation.de: Ich flutete meine Schule wegen einer Mathearbeit.

translation.en: Taps, sprinklers, toilets…
Have you ever waded through human poo?
I have.
Not pleasant.
Sometimes being a fairy means you have to deal with shit.
translation.de: Als Fee muss man manchmal durch Scheiße waten.

translation.en: So my…
mom and I don't really get along.
I know. It's a shocker. I'm not…
exactly the ideal daughter for her. She'd love a cheerleader, and I'm…
translation.de: …ihre ideale Tochter. Eine Cheerleaderin wäre ihr lieber.

translation.en: whatever the opposite of a cheerleader is.
-[Bloom] What the actual hell? -Slam your door, lose your door.
translation.de: Was zum Teufel? Tür zuknallen, Tür verlieren.

translation.en: Dad? Dad. Dad, she's crazy. You know that.
translation.de: Dad, sie spinnt. Das weißt du.

translation.en: You need to be more open with us.
So, this is a good start? Teaching your daughter she has no privacy
or boundaries or agency?
Don't you feminist with me. This basic bitch'll break out her bullhorn
and her dissertation and take your ass to school.
translation.de: oder ich zeig dir meine Dissertation.

translation.en: Every comeback is another week without your door. Hit me.
translation.de: Jede Erwiderung macht eine Woche ohne Tür. Nur zu.

translation.en: That's what I thought.
[Bloom] That night, I… couldn't sleep.
translation.de: In jener Nacht konnte ich nicht schlafen.

translation.en: Every time I closed my eyes, the rage just kept building.
translation.de: Sobald ich die Augen schloss, stieg die Wut in mir auf.

translation.en: Then it happened.
It was almost like the fire had a life of its own.
translation.de: Es war, als hätte das Feuer ein Eigenleben.

translation.en: I don't remember how long I let it burn. I just remember their screams.
translation.de: Ich erinnere mich nur an ihre Schreie.

translation.en: [dad] Bloom! Bloom!
Somebody help us!
Please!
[Bloom] Mom? Is she OK?
[dad] Get her outta here!
My mom was…
covered in third-degree burns…
'cause of me.
Every night after that, I…
translation.de: Ab da schlich ich mich jeden Abend raus.

translation.en: I snuck out. I was so…
translation.de: Ab da schlich ich mich jeden Abend raus. Ich hatte so…

translation.en: scared that I'd hurt them again…
that I slept in this… [chuckles] …creepy-ass… [sniffles] …warehouse near my house
translation.de: Ich schlief in diesem unheimlichen Lagerhaus.

translation.en: until Miss Dowling found me.
All right.
Fire story beats shit story.
You win.
And your parents had no idea it was you?
translation.de: Und deine Eltern hatten keine Ahnung?

translation.en: I don't know how distant my fairy ancestors are, but…
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, wie weit entfernt meine Feenverwandten sind,

translation.en: the most mystical thing my parents believe in is knocking on wood.
translation.de: aber meine Eltern klopfen maximal auf Holz.

translation.en: What?
It's just odd.
You drew on a good deal of magic without even trying.
translation.de: Du beschwörst ungewollt derlei Kräfte herauf.

translation.en: It's hard to believe you're from a dormant bloodline.
Is there any chance you're adopted?
[chuckles] No.
No, I… No, I've heard the story of my birth a million times.
translation.de: Ich kenne die Geschichte meiner Geburt.

translation.en: "Miracle baby." I…
had a heart defect in the womb, but a day after I was born, it was gone.
translation.de: Ich hatte einen Herzfehler. Nach der Geburt war er weg.

translation.en: [voice trembles] Oh God. You…
You're a changeling.
What's that?
Aisha, what's a changeling?
A changeling is a fairy baby that's switched with a human one at birth.
translation.de: Ein Feenbaby, das gegen ein echtes getauscht wird.

translation.en: -Wait, what? -It's barbaric. It barely happens anymore.
That's not possible.
You're clearly very powerful, Bloom. You have to be pure-blooded.
translation.de: Bei der Kraft musst du reinblütig sein.

translation.en: I would know if my parents weren't my parents, Aisha.
Why would you even say that? [chuckles wryly]
I'm just trying to help.
Well, you're not.
What the hell did you tell her?
The truth. Because someone's been lying to her.
translation.de: Die Wahrheit. Weil jemand sie angelogen hat.

translation.en: Want some?
-No. I just-- -There's two types of first years.
-Pussies and aspiring former pussies. -[chuckles]
Sorta feels like it's less a binary choice and more a spectrum, but…
translation.de: Klingt mir mehr nach einem Spektrum, aber…

translation.en: -No. -[boy chuckles]
Cheers when you're done.
Are you bullying the first years? Be more basic.
translation.de: Mobbst du die Neuen? Wie originell!

translation.en: -I can't bully the willing, right? -I don't know what that means.
Just ignore him. He thinks he's some badass. You should've seen him last year. He's just a tragic nerd in disguise.
translation.de: Ignorieren. Er hält sich für den Größten, aber ist nur ein verkappter Freak.

translation.en: And she's just three people in disguise.
translation.de: Und sie ist fett für drei.

translation.en: -Whoa. Come on, man. -No, I've got this.
People always think that they can treat the big girl like shit
translation.de: Füllige Mädchen werden immer wie Scheiße behandelt,

translation.en: because we're… we're sweet,
and we're harmless, and we should be happy that you're even talking to us.
translation.de: und harmlos und froh, dass überhaupt wer mit uns redet.

translation.en: But sometimes, we've had a really, really bad day,
translation.de: Aber manchmal hatten wir einen echt schlechten Tag,

translation.en: and some scrawny little arsehole says the wrong thing at the wrong time,
translation.de: und sagt ein dürres Arschloch was Falsches

translation.en: and we're not happy you're talking to us, and we're not sweet, and most of all,
translation.de: und wir sind nicht froh und nicht süß und vor allem

translation.en: we are not harmless.
Huh? Sorry?
What was that, Riv? I…
I'm sure it's really funny, but I can't quite hear it.
translation.de: Es war sicher witzig, aber ich verstehe nicht.

translation.en: -You could've killed me, you freak. -Missed you too.
translation.de: -Du hättest mich töten können. -Ich dich auch.

translation.en: Sorry, I'm Terra. That wasn't my ideal first impression.
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Terra. Das war kein guter erster Eindruck.

translation.en: Is it better or worse than throwing up after a single drink?
translation.de: Ist es besser, sich nach einem Drink zu übergeben?

translation.en: Oh no. Come on, quickly.
[Stella] Is that your family?
I get homesick too sometimes.
But my mum…
Honestly, if she didn't force me to go here, I wouldn't.
translation.de: Würde sie mich nicht zwingen, wäre ich nicht hier.

translation.en: I'd live at home,
go to school, just have a normal life. [chuckles]
You know there's no shame in that?
translation.de: Dafür muss man sich nicht schämen.

translation.en: No shame in wanting to be home.
[Aisha] She's blanking my texts.
[Musa] Strange. I wonder if it's because she poured her heart out to you and you called her a freak?
translation.de: Komisch, wo du sie doch einen Freak genannt hast.

translation.en: -[Aisha] Have you seen Bloom? -Not recently.
-Yes? -Your face looks so calm, yet you're racked with guilt.
You're a mind fairy.
[Terra] A mind fairy?
-What's your connection? Memory-- -Not a great time.
-[Terra] Is everything OK? -[Aisha] Not really.
I'm looking for Bloom. For some reason, Stella's feeling guilty about it.
translation.de: Ich suche Bloom, und Stella fühlt sich schuldig.

translation.en: Could everyone save the drama for drama club?
translation.de: Könnt ihr euch das Drama sparen?

translation.en: [Terra] Wasn't she talking to Sky?
And?
And I know what happened to the last person who was talking to Sky.
translation.de: Ich weiß, was mit der Letzten geschah, die das tat.

translation.en: -I was here last year, remember? -[scoffs]
Stella, where's Bloom?
She was feeling homesick,
so I did a nice thing, and I lent her my ring
translation.de: also lieh ich ihr meinen Ring,

translation.en: so that she could go back to the First World.
translation.de: damit sie in die Erste Welt reisen konnte.

translation.en: [Terra] Doesn't it only work outside the Barrier?
translation.de: Muss sie dafür durch die Barriere?

translation.en: [Stella] Yes, and there's a gateway in the old cemetery.
translation.de: Ja. Es gibt ein Tor auf dem alten Friedhof.

translation.en: [Terra] That's deep in the forest, Stella.
You know what's out there, right?
translation.de: Du weißt, was da draußen ist.

translation.en: -[mom] It's Bloom. -Hmm.
[dad] Whoa! Twice in one day.
-Hold on, I'm calling the news. -[Bloom chuckles]
Real Chatty Cathy here. All it took was moving across the world.
translation.de: Kaum bist du weg, wirst du zur Plaudertasche.

translation.en: I know, right?
Easy solutions.
-[dad] Hey, you wanna video chat? -No. Um…
I just wanted to check in 'cause we got cut off before, and…
translation.de: Ich rufe nur noch mal an, weil wir vorhin unterbrochen wurden.

translation.en: -You must be jet-lagged. -[Bloom] Mm. Probably.
[clears throat] Is everything OK, Bloom?
Yeah, I'm…
I'm OK.
You know, you don't have to be OK.
You're only 16.
I couldn't have done it when I was your age.
You should be thankful you have your mom's bravery.
translation.de: Den Mut hast du von Mom.

translation.en: What if I… What if I…
like, made a mistake?
You're too special for here. It's not who you are.
translation.de: Dieser Ort hier passt nicht zu dir.

translation.en: What if you don't know who I am?
translation.de: Und wenn ihr mich nicht kennt?

translation.en: [dad] Hey, we are your parents, Bloom. If we don't know you, nobody does.
translation.de: Wir sind deine Eltern. Wenn wir dich nicht kennen, tut es keiner.

translation.en: [mom] Is there something else?
Something you wanna tell us?
No, you're right.
Alfea's where I belong now.
Bloom, listen to me.
Whatever you're going through, I know it sucks,
but I also know you can handle it.
I always knew your path wouldn't be like everyone else's.
translation.de: Ich wusste immer, dass du anders bist.

translation.en: -[chuckles] -[mom] Not like mine or your father's. That's hard.
translation.de: Anders als ich oder dein Vater. Das ist hart.

translation.en: But at the end of it,
I can't wait to see who you become.
[dad] We love you, Bloom.
[sniffles] I love you too.
Please, please, please… [screams]
Don't stop now.
-[Aisha] Are you OK? -[Bloom gasps]
Yeah. Yeah, yeah, I think so. What the hell was that thing?
translation.de: Ja, ich glaube schon. -Was war das? -Ich denke, ein Verbrannter.

translation.en: -I'm pretty sure it's called a Burned One. -Huh?
-Wait. Where… where's Stella? -She's at school. Why?
translation.de: Wo ist Stella? In der Schule. Warum?

translation.en: That thing just took her ring.
You can't be in here, Stel.
If Silva finds out…
I'll leave before the sun comes up.
[Sky] You can't pull this shit, Stel… You broke up with me.
translation.de: Das geht nicht, Stel. Du hast Schluss gemacht.

translation.en: No, I know.
I didn't hear from you all summer, and then I say two words to a first year?
translation.de: Den ganzen Sommer, nichts. Dann rede ich kurz mit der Neuen und…

translation.en: I said I know, OK?
I'm sorry.
What are you doing here?
I got jealous.
Yeah, I know I'm not allowed to, but I did.
translation.de: Ja, ich weiß, das geht nicht.

translation.en: And I did something really stupid.
-Now they all think I'm a monster. -Oh, Stel…
translation.de: Jetzt hassen sie mich. -Oh, Stel… -Bitte. Ich kann da nicht schlafen.

translation.en: [Stella] No, please. I can't sleep in there, Sky.
translation.de: -Oh, Stel… -Bitte. Ich kann da nicht schlafen.

translation.en: In a room where everybody hates me.
Please. Tonight, can I just stay with you?
Next to someone who doesn't… hate me.
translation.de: Bei jemandem, der mich nicht hasst.

translation.en: You're better than you think you are, Stella.
translation.de: Du bist besser, als du denkst, Stella.

translation.en: Other people can't see that if you don't.
translation.de: Du musst es nur zuerst sehen.

translation.en: [Aisha] The headmistress will take care of the Burned One, Bloom.
translation.de: Sie kümmert sich um den Verbrannten.

translation.en: She won't leave it in the First World.
Don't worry.
Your parents are safe.
Thanks.
Are you burning the midnight oil?
Snorting the midnight Adderall is more like it.
But I'll need sleep eventually.
Hands are kinda full.
[clicks tongue] You're a first year.
I'm a lot of things.
So I know you want to listen to your music,
and I, uh, I totally get that, um, but we are…
translation.de: und ich verstehe das, aber wir müssen…

translation.en: stuck together for a while.
So…
I borrowed this off my brother. It's a speaker, so we don't have to talk.
translation.de: Von meinem Bruder. Ein Lautsprecher. Wir müssen nicht reden.

translation.en: You can be in your world. You just…
translation.de: So bist du in deiner Welt…

translation.en: won't be alone in it.
Or not. It's no… It's not a big deal.
-[Musa] Don't be angry. -I'm not.
Can you stop with the fake happy bullshit for one second?
translation.de: Hör auf, so fröhlich zu tun.

translation.en: I'm a genuinely happy person.
And I'm an empath.
I can feel everything that you feel.
translation.de: Ich fühle alles, was du fühlst.

translation.en: Your anxiety with me, your insecurity with Stella,
translation.de: Angst vor mir, Unsicherheit gegenüber Stella, deine Wut.

translation.en: and your anger right now, all of it, if not worse than you.
translation.de: Angst vor mir, Unsicherheit gegenüber Stella, deine Wut. Alles, und vielleicht mehr als du.

translation.en: That's my gift, if you can call it that.
I put my headphones on
so I can take a break from everyone else's emotions
translation.de: kann ich die Emotionen anderer ausblenden

translation.en: and just focus on mine.
But if you really wanna know how I feel…
[Dowling] I chained it up in a barn outside the Barrier.
translation.de: Ich fesselte ihn in einer Scheune.

translation.en: -[teacher] You should've killed it. -And left it in the human world?
translation.de: -Du hättest ihn töten sollen. -Und dort lassen?

translation.en: You should've brought it back here and then killed it.
translation.de: Du hättest ihn hier töten sollen.

translation.en: Did it break your skin?
No, I'm not infected.
I've got Ben to make up some oil from the Zanbaq flowers in the greenhouse.
translation.de: Ben hat ein Öl aus Zanbaq-Blüten gemacht.

translation.en: I've dosed it. It won't be conscious for hours.
-Farah… -I need to get in its head.
We need to know if this is an isolated incident or something more.
translation.de: Wir müssen wissen, ob mehr dahintersteckt.

translation.en: Something more?
Like what?
I found a changeling in the First World.
translation.de: Ich fand ein Wechselbalg in der Ersten Welt.

translation.en: A changeling.
I've not heard of one of those in centuries.
translation.de: Das gab es seit Jahrhunderten nicht.

translation.en: Yet there she was…
left 16 years ago…
right around the time the last Burned One was spotted.
translation.de: Als der letzte Verbrannte gesichtet wurde.

translation.en: You think it's all connected.
I'm struggling, Saul.
Rosalind kept so much from us.
I'm worried about the students.
The Alfea they know is very different from the one we attended.
translation.de: Ihr Alfea ist anders als unseres damals.

translation.en: -[chuckles] -[phone chimes]
[Dowling] They have so much life to experience.
translation.de: Sie müssen noch so viel erleben.

translation.en: [Dowling] Even if this world were safe, what they're going through can feel impossible.
translation.de: Sie hätten es selbst in einer sicheren Welt schwer.

translation.en: But this world isn't safe,
translation.de: Aber diese Welt ist nicht sicher.

translation.en: and I don't know how long we'll be able to protect them from it.
translation.de: Wie lange werden wir sie schützen können?

translation.en: I know you feel it.
The… shift.
They've had order for so long, they don't know what chaos feels like.
translation.de: Sie wissen nicht, was Chaos ist.

translation.en: They might soon.
Morning, sunshine.
♪ I wish her well ♪
